name: Resident Enis: Monster Gultch
description:
Resident Enis: Monster Gultch is based off of the Resident Enis series by Random Encounters on YouTube. you can check out their page here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCroJ5uxmGr-WOtXUP...

I did receive permission to publish this game, however I am not a member of Random Encounters (as cool as thatd be) also, do not ask Random Encounters any technical support questions regarding this game. That should be done in the comments section.

If Random Encounters produces more of their Resident Enis series, I will add more to this game, alternatively, if you guys want, I could make up additional story content to add to this game.

*This game was made in RPG Maker VX ACE

Leave any suggestions you have in the comments. I hope you enjoy!
